text: Arrā no (michi no) tame ni, kagiri o tsukushite funtō doryoku shi nasai. Kare wa, anata gata o eraba reru. Kono oshie wa, anata gata ni ku-gyō o oshitsukenai. Kore wa anata gata no sosen, iburāhīmu no kyōgidearu. Kare wa izen mo, mata kono (kuruān) ni oite mo, anata gata o musurimu to nadzuke rareta. Shito wa anata gata no tame no risshō-shadeari, mata anata gata wa hitobito no tame no risshō-shadearu. Dakara reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o okonai, shikkari to arrā ni sugari nasai. Kare wa anata gata no gādiandearu. Nanto sugureta gādian, nanto sugureta enjo-shadearu koto yo
